    • deserializeRequest

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject deserializeRequest(String requestBody) throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      deserializes the incoming request body into a JSON object.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - - the request body as a string
      Returns:
      a JsonObject of the incoming request body
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if string passed is invalid as a json object, a JsonSyntaxException is thrown.

    • getRequestBodyAsString

      public static String getRequestBodyAsString(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException
      Reads the entire body of an incoming request and returns the result as a string.
      Parameters:
      request - - The incoming request
      Returns:
      the entire request body as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - - if the reader fails to read the request body, an IOException will be thrown.

    • getRefSuffix

      public static String getRefSuffix(String fullRef)
      Takes a ref name refs/heads/issue/1 and returns issue1 to be used to sort filesystem.
      Parameters:
      fullRef - - Received from GitHub API as refs/heads/issue/1
      Returns:
      the ref suffix without slashes, i.e. refs/heads/issue/1 -> issue1

      public static void main(String[] args)
